goals: Teach according to the unique author's method and share the experience of students
To transfer universal knowledge and skills that will be useful both in your professional and personal life
To help overcome one's own barriers and achieve success in personal self-development.

aboutSchool.title: About school
aboutSchool.subTitle: will help you
features: Develop emotionality and the ability to manage emotions
Improve the ability to improvise and work with the word
Love your voice, make it pleasant and attractive
Voice the characters and bring them to life with your voice
Touch the art of acting: create your own characters and embody them
Create interesting scenarios and learn how to implement them
To master techniques and exercises for the development of SOFT SKILLS
To interest and captivate the audience, to be a great speaker!
Defend your point of view and infect others with your ideas
Create an effective and memorable presentation
Forget about fear and be confident before public speaking
Learn not to lose balance in conflict situations

positions.label: Important for
list: Public or political figures
Novice actors
People speaking in front of a crowded audience
Organizers of meetings, presentations and seminars
Specialists in sales
Video bloggers developing their own brand

goals.label: For those who
list: Shy and unsure of himself and his voice
Wants to change and become a better version of himself
Has bad experience in public speaking, or no experience at all
Does not know how to present and tell a story correctly
Cannot express himself emotionally and consistently
Worried and does not know how to hold the attention of the audience
Complexes in the company of strangers and does not know how to start a conversation

format.title: Training format
format.subTitle: All lessons

list: No summaries and long lectures
A minimum of theory - a maximum of practice
Easy and affordable
Individual approach
Convenient format and time of study
The result is already after the first lesson
cards.marketing: Try the first class for free!

cards.title: Group classes
list: Speaking practice
Work in pairs and groups
Additional motivation

cards.marketing: Try the first class for free!

advantageList: More than 60% of the course is practice. Therefore, it is important to attend classes. It is best to choose a cozy and quiet place where it will be convenient for you to do all the exercises.
At the end of the course, you will receive a certificate of course completion and final feedback from the teacher.

comments.name: Fylyp
comments.comment: It was interesting for me to study with Kirill. We worked with oratory, diction, and staged theatrical skits. I liked everything, more thanks to Kiril.

comments.name: Artur
comments.comment: Recently, I had public speaking classes with Kirill and I found the experience to be satisfactory. He was professional and knowledgeable in his craft. Kirill provided a range of practical exercises that helped me improve my public speaking skills, as well as other skills such as articulation and quick thinking. I appreciated that he gave clear and concise feedback that helped me improve my voice, body language, and storytelling abilities.

comments.name: Sveta Boeva
comments.comment: Kirill is a great coach and an inspirational, enthusiastic, and motivating person! Each lesson, he creates a safe and encouraging environment to practice and learn. He gives precise techniques on how to improve your voice, body language, and tell a story in a compelling, emotional, and genuine way that captivates the audience and gets them hooked immediately. Not only do I learn to speak in public with confidence, but I also feel energized and ready to take on the world after each lesson.

comments.name: Марк
comments.comment: Прекрасний викладач, що вміє зацікавити предметом та правильно розставити акценти під час навчання! Уроки проходять на одному диханні. Однозначно рекомендую!

comments.name: Julia
comments.comment: Kirill is a brilliant, warm, and friendly teacher. I highly recommend his lessons. I was not a total beginner to the subject, but my heart always sunk when I had to speak in public. His lessons are incredibly well structured, Kirill gave me a lot of practical exercises that help in other domains as well (exercises for articulation and improving the voice, exercises to develop quick thinking and reaction, etc.) Thanks to Kirill, I now sail through my presentations pain-free, and even took up a new interest in public speaking.

comments.name: Сергій
comments.comment: Після багатьох місяців занять можу з впевненістю рекомендувати Кирила. Кожне заняття це різноманітні теоретичні та практичні вправи які доповнюються розбором найвідоміших виступів та промов. То ж ви не тільки пропрацюєте окремі елементи як то імпровізація, інтонація, жести тощо, але й повноцінний виступ. Таким чином, ви дуже швидко зможете знайти та покращити слабкі місця вашого виступу і зроби з нього виступ вашої мрії)

comments.name: Alla
comments.comment: Huge thanks to Kirill ! I enjoy our lessons. Kirill is a very friendly and patient tutor. Although the lessons are challenging for me, I'm looking forward to every meeting!

comments.name: Alyona
comments.comment: Кирилл превосходный коуч, он даёт много практических заданий, диалогов и объясняет очень много, на каждом уроке моя дочь получает большое количество полезных и ценных знаний, которые ей помогут в жизни. Уроки проходят в приятной атмосфере, насыщенно, живо, интересно. Мы просто счастливы, что занимаемся у Кирилла!

comments.name: Antonina Anisovich
comments.comment: I had the privilege of being a student of Kirill and I cannot express enough how grateful I am for the transformative experience. I wholeheartedly recommend Kirill to anyone seeking to enhance their public speaking abilities. He is a true professional and an invaluable asset for anyone aspiring to become a more persuasive, impactful, and confident speaker.

advertise.label: The first class
advertise.title: Free
advertise.text: Don't miss the opportunity to become the best version of yourself. Sign up for a free trial class with Ambidexter today!

cards.title: The ability to speak
list: Oratorical skills: eye contact, gesticulation, intonation, tempo of speech
Competent expression of opinions and improvement of communication skills
Overcoming the fear of public speaking and communicating with people
Using voice and speech to highlight information
The development of active listening skills and the ability to interact with the audience during a dialogue or discussion.

cards.title: Voice acting
list: Voice: how to be heard, persuasive and interesting
Correct subtexts and emotionality in the speech
Intonation technique
The role of the voice in public speeches, presentations and everyday communication
Engaging the audience with voice
Speech tempo and use of pauses

cards.title: Non-verbal communication. Body language.
list: How to stand, where to put your hands: analysis of successful and unsuccessful use of gestures by speakers
Work on posture and expressiveness of gestures during communication and speeches
Types and functional features of non-verbal communication
How to effectively use our body language to express emotions and establish a connection with the interlocutor or audience
Correct use of non-verbal communication: how to become a more confident speaker and make your communication more effective

cards.title: Language improvisation. Work with the word.
list: Speech without preparation
Storytelling in real time
Answers to provocative questions
Tools of improvisation in public speaking
Practical exercises on the speed of formulating thoughts and transforming them into speech
The skill not to hide in the center of attention, but to enjoy it
Non-standard and associative thinking

cards.title: The art of argumentation. How to convince. Defend your point of view.
list: Techniques of correct formulation and presentation of an argument
The structure of a persuasive speech
Develop the ability for critical thinking
The ability to lead a discussion and use arguments correctly
What (not) to say to customers and how to extinguish conflicts: an algorithm
Development of strategies for peaceful resolution of conflicts
Iron logic: how to win convincingly in arguments
Get concrete experience of applying the suggested methods of persuasion in practice

cards.title: Storytelling. Story is the currency of the 21st century.
list: The power of persuasion through a well-told story
Become the soul of the company by telling stories
Preparation of interesting stories "from nothing"
Captivate your story and hold your audience's attention
Building and telling a compelling story
The structure and elements of a powerful corporate story
Stories that help persuade and sell
Creating a brand
Motivating employees and transferring experience through stories

cards.title: The art of self-presentation. The ability to make a first impression.
list: Creating an impressive image and effective communication of own ideas
Development of charisma
How to make your own product or service unique and be able to tell about it in an interesting way
Preparing for the interview and correctly presenting your experience and achievements
Self-presentation strategies to manage the audience's impression and get them to accept your ideas

cards.title: Soft skills. Skills that are needed today.
list: Learn to better understand the psychology of communication between people
How to remove a huge number of fears and unnecessary worries
Team work. Build new, effective relationships with colleagues at work and in the family
Master the techniques of active listening and prevent conflicts in relationships
Improve emotional and social competence in communicating with people: recognize, understand and manage emotions

cards.title: Structuring the speech
list: Preparation for the speech: structure and development of the topic
Elements of a successful performance and presentation
Choosing a goal and transforming an abstract idea into a communicable message
Basics of dramaturgy and attracting the attention of the audience
Analysis of famous historical speeches

cards.title: Final speech on the chosen topic
list: Final speech
Feedback from the course and performance
Certificate of completion of the public speaking course

cards.title: Emotionality
list: The difference between feelings and emotions and working out one's own emotional intelligence
Development of a range of emotions through play, different situations and characters
Skills to express emotions through gestures and facial expressions

cards.title: Voice
list: Work on pronunciation, intonation and subtexts
Voice strength and timbre
Dubbing
How to play the voice and change it

cards.title: Body
list: The power to have full control of one's own body
Practicing emancipation, overcoming psychological barriers
Gesticulation. Body language and its features in communication

cards.title: Fantasy and imagination
list: Exercises for expressiveness, imagination and creative thinking
Development of imagination
Creating a scenario - from idea to implementation

cards.title: Improvisation
list: Development of memory, attention and creative imagination
Improvisational practices for stage and life
Training of all types of memory: auditory, visual, emotional, motor

cards.title: How to act for the camera
list: Being natural on camera
Camera. Where to look, what to say, how to move
How to accept yourself and your voice during live broadcasts or recordings

cards.title: Characters
list: The ability to create and transform into characters
Immersion in the role. Ability to think outside the box and act in usual circumstances
Analysis of acting techniques based on examples of famous theater and film actors

cards.title: Final lesson
list: Final creative task
Feedback from the course and performance
Acting course completion certificate
